name: Shall we date?: Can't Say No
name_original: Shall we date?: Can't Say No
description:
Introducing a new story from Shall we date series!
“Shall we date?: Can’t Say No”
A dangerous but irresistible love story is now released.

1.Story introduction
Every day, your (player) life is ended with exhaustion from the overtime work and your rocky relationship with your fiancé.

One day, as usual you are so tired of your work and somehow you are drawn to the little cafe near your office with its rich coffee aroma. You sat at the counter and yet the first thing you can think of is your fiancé.

But things are different today.
Your life is about to change when you meet this charming and seductive man at the cafe and you didn’t see it coming.
What is waiting ahead?
Will you able to keep your usual simple life or decide to take a road down to a passionate and dangerous romance?

Sometimes love can be dangerous in a grown up world. So can you say no?

2.Features
1)It all started at the café…
2)Multiples ending stories: the choices you make will determine how each story ends.
3)Beautiful graphic photos
